recommendations.recommendation: Document the glassmorphism card implementation details, CSS properties used (backdrop-filter, opacity, blur effects), and any browser compatibility considerations.
Add visual regression tests and cross-browser compatibility tests for glassmorphism effects, especially for Safari and older browsers that may not support backdrop-filter.
Establish reusable card component variants system to ensure consistency across all 6 subtasks. Create a component props interface documenting all glassmorphism variants.
Continue phase-based approach but monitor subtask completion velocity. With 2/6 completed and 4 phases total, maintain focus on phase 2 completion before phase 3.
Document session handoffs between 3+ day gaps. Create task summary checklist to review at session start to maintain context continuity.
